Items.Title: Communication from the Public Advocate - Submitting the name of Leah S. Goodridge as a member of the New York City Planning Commission pursuant to §§ 31 and 192(a) of the New York City Charter.

Items.Title: Communication from the New York County Democratic Committee recommending the name of Marc Landis to the Council regarding his appointment to the office of Commissioner of Elections of the Board of Elections pursuant to § 3-204 of the New York State Election Law.

Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Marc Landis - Democratic Elections Commissioner for New York County.
